1421.content:
Junes: Inaba's go-to department store for all kinds of needs met.

The store was one of a large chain that was spread all across Japan, this one in particular being owned by one of Naoto's upperclassmen and close friend, Yosuke Hanamura, and also the gateway into the Midnight Channel, the other side of reality where Shadows bred and the instrument of murder in last year's serial case that took the lives of two people, three if the copycat killer was to be counted. After having caught the killer, Naoto and her friends rarely hung out at Junes anymore, having more time to spend visiting each other at their homes for friendly banter, study sessions, and the occasional visit to Okina City to catch a movie or go shopping, though, this mostly excluded Souji and Naoto, Souji having travelled back home since the murder case was solved, and Naoto being very busy with her detective work; the two sought to enjoy spending time with the members of the Investigation Team on their free time however, mainly during the holiday season.

Naoto stopped into Junes on this rare day where her schedule wasn't filled with work, hoping to find a remedy for her height problem, even if the effect provided was very little. Naoto stood in the electronics department, reminiscing of her time spent working the Inaba murders with her friends, and started mapping out scenarios in her head that may relieve her of her problem. "There are two common options many take when looking to grow taller." Naoto thought to herself. "A good diet of vitamins, minerals, and proteins would be a great option of promoting height growth, of which the Food Court would be able to fulfill these qualities, and the other option..." She trailed off, glancing at the map of Junes that directed shoppers to different floors for their various needs; in particular, Naoto was staring at the label that read "HEALTH & BEAUTY". Naoto made a slight frown, continuing her monologue, "While I've put my gender issues behind me, I still don't feel that showing myself in the Beauty Products department would be a smart idea. While a number of compounds there would help promote human growth, if Rise-san ever found out I was spotted in an aisle where women look to bring out the best in themselves, I'd never hear the end of it..."

Naoto was conflicted in her decision, both options were on two opposite sides of one another; dieting was a slow, long-term process, but seemed normal enough not to cause a ruckus amongst Inaba's gossip-seeking population, while health and beauty products could have overnight results at best, though, knowing her friends Rise Kujikawa and Teddie, a hit-idol in Japan and a would-be Casanova, both known for their gossip-spreading nature, it'd be almost impossible to salvage the reputation of a strong, serious detective she'd been building up through most of her life. Then, it hit her, perhaps the answer wasn't one that normal reality would be able to fulfill. Naoto glanced at the large flat-screen TV her friends used to enter the Midnight Channel in the past; the realm was full of crazy happenings and items that are impossible to explain and dubious in effect, the Midnight Channel in particular unlocked Naoto's Persona, Sukuna Hikona, which carried a long, sci-fi-esque beam sword and shot pure beams of light and darkness from its body, two things that would not be considered in the realms of normality. If she was able to acquire a being that was able to eradicate demonic Shadows with a single thought, then perhaps the world of the Midnight Channel would be able to provide Naoto with an option to grow taller without the negatives her two realistic options each carried.

Naoto pulled out her gun, then put it back realizing she wasn't supposed to have one and put it away, she then kicked the door down. She saw nothing out of the ordinary yet. The detective and her tight-knit circle of friends were used to otherworldly insanity but Yumi certainly wasn’t…although to be fair even during the investigation she had never seen anything like this. Yumi was literally blimping out before her very eyes!

Going from phone call to phone call Naoto kept a close watch over Yumi’s now very immobile form. She was however able to contain her potential emotional breakdown due to Naoto’s mere presence and the comfort the blue-haired girl attempted to give her after every call she made.

She couldn’t quite make out who Naoto was on call with at the moment but regardless smiled at the kindness being shown to her from the younger girl. A part of her had believed that Naoto would freak out and refuse to help out in any possible way but instead while she was initially surprised Naoto had still gone out of her way to calm her fears. She was still growing yes but at least there was someone with her and that same someone was trying to do something about her strange dilemma.

A short time later the detective had made the last of her calls, the rest of their group of friends already on the way, she sighed for a moment now refocusing on how to help out Yumi until the others all made their way over…

“AHHH!”

The raven-haired woman’s sudden yell nearly startled her off her feet. Now that one was different from the original scream she had first heard. This one was seemingly born of terror not agony. Rushing over Naoto stood in surprise as the simple-looking rose that lay lifeless on the floor when she had first found Yumi was now violently stirring!

Was it actually coming alive? Impossible, no wait she recalled how Yumi had stated that the flower was a gift from Teddie and with the way it was starting to act…

The realization dawned on her before reaching for her hidden away pistol. She knew full well where it was from and now had to put it down before it could cause any more harm!

“Kyaaa!”

Yumi screeched in horror as the seemingly harmless flower was now stirring violently a moment launched itself straight at the vastly immobile and very frighten girl!

However before it could cause the poor girl any more harm a single shot rang out, eyes shut Yumi yelled out in horror once more. Everything was simply happening too fast for her to comprehend yet there was a small glimmer of hope as she could almost make out the rose “hiss” in pain as it withered away on the floorboards. Although due to her new mass she obviously couldn’t make out if the demon of a flower had truly been put down.

Her fears were lessened a tad after catching a bit of a glimpse of Naoto’s approaching figure. She couldn’t move too well much less move her face but still managed something of a smile as the detective made her way over.

With her pistol put away the blue-haired girl was ever so thankful for her precise aiming skills. She only had a single shot at nailing the hell flower one misfire would have spelled disaster thankfully she was as good a shot as ever and now the strange plant life lay dead on the floor. Scoping it into a jar she had picked up Naoto ensured that was it indeed lifeless after all the last thing either girl needed was the flower coming back to life.

After setting the jar aside Naoto at last made her way over to poor helpless Yumi.

“Naoto-kun is it…”

Yumi choked a bit on her words obviously still very shaken from the ordeal she’d been going through.

“Yes Sempai everything’s going to be alright now.”

The blue-haired girl reassured her with a soft smile.

“Are you alright Yumi-Sempai?” she asked kindly staring at the mass of female flesh that Yumi had unfortunately transformed into. A part of her wished she had gotten here sooner perhaps if she had she could have prevented the older girl from becoming completely immobile.

If she could Naoto would have kicked herself right then and there but her thoughts were interrupted once Yumi spoke up.

“I’m fine…well not fine, but you get the idea.”

Naoto nodded noticing that Yumi seemingly had more to say.

“Ah…I think I’ve stopped growing…”

Now that had certainly caught the detective’s attention. Was she sure? Yumi responded stating that she certainly felt as if she was no longer growing any thicker but…

The older girl’s now puffy cheeks nearly beamed a sharp crimson as she felt Naoto placing her hands upon her bed of a belly.

“N…Naoto-kun, what are you?”

She heard a bit of a muffled cough after the younger girl released the hold on her flesh. Clearly embarrassed Naoto ran a hand through her short locks of her hair, her usual hat removed for but a moment, the detective prince explained that she was checking to see if Yumi was indeed finished. As it turned out as far as she could tell the raven-haired girl was in fact done growing of course this still left her in a blob-like state.

“I see. Then thank you, Naoto-kun.”

Yumi’s heart-felted thanks actually caused the blue-haired girl to blush a bit as she placed her hat back at top her head.

“So…now what, do you have any idea of what happen to me?” Yumi asked attempting to break the sudden awkward moment between the two girls.

“Yes actually I have something of an idea…” Naoto explained once again deep in thought at the flower’s origins and it’s strange abilities.

As Yumi continues to cry she heard a knocking on the door, she raised her head. Not company, not now! Yumi wanted to scream to the knocking to go away, but she was raised better then that, she waddled up to the door. "W-Who is it?"

"Yumi, it's me Rise. I was heading home but I wanted to see how you were doing."

Yumi wanted to shout 'Go Away' or 'Don't come in!' but she was worried, she didn't want to push away a new friend but she was still at a loss for her still going growth, she found herself stretching her sweat clothes to their utmost limit with her body still gaining at an incredible rate. "Yumi? Is there something, wrong. Come on, you can tell me anything." Rise replied. Yumi realized that she did need some help, she had no idea what was going on and to be honest she was feeling quite alone and needed someone, anyone to help.

"Okay, but you can't tell anyone." Yumi unlocked the door and opened up, she pulled Rise in and slammed the door before anyone saw anything.

"Yumi, what was that f...or..." Rise looked in utter confusion at the fact that Yumi was now a completly different person now, she saw two chins and a third forming, fat tearing a workout attire, and poking out through every single tear it had. Yumi, who just this morning was as if not more skinny then Rise, was now bigger then Hanako.

"I don't know what's going on! I just found myself bloated up like this for no reason! I'm scared Rise-chan...what's happening to me...?" Yumi was obviously shaken up, Rise figured this had something to do with the TV world, but she wasn't a thinker, and she didn't have much to go on. She knew one thing and one thing only, that a friend was suffering, she took Yumi's hand and walked her over to the couch.

"There there, it's okay. I won't tell anyone, I swear it." She was lying, she wanted to tell her friends but she needed to calm Yumi down.

"I don't know what to do, I tried working out but I only got fatter! I didn't eat much today, so I'm not bloated, I just wish I knew what was going on!" Yumi was crying but Rise lifted the black haired girl's head up.

"Look, I know what you're probably thinking. 'Souji won't ever like me like this, he'll think I'm hideous.' Is that it?"

"A-a little..."

"Well you know he cares about the you on the inside. He does for everyone, sure Chie-sempai might be rough and tumble, but Sempai knew she had a softer side, a caring side. Yukiko-sempai may have been a push over, but Sempai saw her strength, he even saw the Real Me, the Me I thought I lost in all my years working on TV. He cares about the you on the inside." Yumi lowered her head, she nodded.

"You're right, thanks Rise-chan...still, being this fat...and still going...it's not healthy, I might die if this keeps go..." Suddenly her stomach growled.

"OHHHHHHHHHHHHHAAAUUUGGGHHHHH!" Yumi doubled over in pain, she slid off the couch and her upper body leaned against the table. Rise grabbed the shoulder of the fattened blob, who slowly stood up, panting.

"Need....food, it hurts too much..." Yumi staggered over to the kitchen, Rise looking worried.

"Yumi..." This hunger wasn't just her way of saying eat, she was changing, becoming something...almost not human. What kind of curse will the Rose's power show next?

"Ai's gone too far this time!" Chie fumed as she danced from foot to foot, her gentle brown eyes narrowed in anger, "She's always acting so.. so stuck up! Like she's better than everyone else, just 'cos she's pretty. Yukiko's gorgeous, and she doesn't treat anyone like that." Yukiko looked over from where she was waiting for her ramen to cool down enough for her to eat, going red at the compliment, and quickly looking back down at her food.

1551111.content:
Ten years ago Nanko Dojima spent time with her cousin who she called 'Big Bro' she remembers those times everyday, those were her happiest times. She remembers all of them; Souji, Yosuke, Chie, Yukiko, Kanji, Rise, Teddie, and Naoto. Though she smiles a lot when she's home or at school Nanako feels lonely at times. The alarm rang as Nanako took her hand out and hit the clock, from such a small girl came a 5 foot 7 brunette keeping her hair down, a moderate sized bust and when she wasn't wearing her school uniform she would wear pink shoes like the ones she had as a kid but bigger, a pink tank top that wasn't reveling because she wasn't that kind of girl, with a white jacket that went to her waist, and white leggings. "Dad?"

"Oh Nanko you're up." Dojima had some gray in his hair from old age, Nanko hugged her father before sitting down.

"So what are you doing today?" He asked as she put bread in the toaster and getting some butter out.

"I think I'm just going to take a walk, maybe I'll try and catch some fish at the flood plains. The old man always gives me nice things for those fish." Nanko smiled as the toast came out and she buttered it.

"Well be careful now."

"I will dad, I'm always careful."

"I know sweetie. Well I have to head off, oh can you pick something up from Junes? We're out of Coffee cream and some sugar."

"Coffee cream and sugar, got it dad!" Nanko said as her dad left, after breakfast Nanko stretched a bit before heading out and locking up.

Nanko's bright smile she gave her dad melted into a moderate smile, she really wasn't as happy as she used to. Her cousin was in College so he can't visit much, Chie and Naoto are both studying Criminology together, Yukiko had become the assistant manager of the Amagi inn, Yosuke was the same deal but for Junes, Kanji always gets so many for his arts and crafts class, Rise was a superstar again and lastly Teddie had seemingly vanished. "I miss them. All of them, I wish I could go back to when I was a kid, we spent so many great times together, we even suffered through the worst together."

Nanko walked around, she saw some people she knew from Yasogami which she was attending, but didn't really say anything to any of them. Nanako was walking around the shopping district, the place wasn't dead yet, faithful costumers kept them in business, as Nanko walked past to Tofu store and nearing the General Store she heard a voice. "Three Topsicles please."

"H-huh!?" Nanko stopped as a boy with blond hair and strong blue eyes walked out, she couldn't believe it, she rubbed her eyes in disbelief.

"T-T-TEDDIE!?"

"Huh? I thought I heard a young maiden cry out my name?" Teddie said looking over to Nanko who was still shocked.

"Oh Miss, do you know me? I am quite the ladies..."

"Teddie it's me! Nanko!"

"N-Nana-chan!" Teddie said being shocked himself, more of a worried shocked then surprised.

"Teddie it really is you!" Nanko walked up pinching Teddie's cheeks.

"How? You're still so...young!" Nanako said seeing that Teddie hasn't aged a bit.

Teddie was worried this would happen if he kept coming to and from his world for some of the human world's treats and leisures. "Nana-chan, you've grown up to be quite the beautiful lady."

Nanako blushed at Teddie's comment. "T-That doesn't answer my question."

Ted sighed. "Nana-chan, I don't know how to tell you without you being unable to understand, do you remember back when you were young and you were kidnapped?"

"Y-Yeah, I was so scared whenever I heard the doorbell ring or someone knocking for a whole two years."

"Do you remember...that place?"

"You mean the place inside the TV?" Nanako replied.

"So you do remember, but you never told anyone?"

"Dad doesn't even believe it, so why would anyone else." Nanako replied.

"Nana-chan I'm from that world, I'm not human."

"Y-You're not?"

"No, I'm not. That's why I was hoping no one I knew would see me, I figured my Bear suit would be too obvious so I tried this body."

"Teddie...you idiot! I was so alone! I wouldn't have told anyone! I mean I DO have friends but, they're not as great as you guys were! I miss those times Teddie! I missed you and all the others!"

"Nana-chan..." Teddie felt bad, he remembered he made a promise long ago to play with Nanako.

"Nana-chan come with me to my world, we can have fun together!" Teddie took Nanako's hand.

"Whoa!" Nanako said taken aback by his sudden enthusiasm

Teddie wants to take Nanako to the TV world, free of corruption it was a beautiful place, Nanako was happy to see Teddie again.

info.brief_description: The girls from the RPG title, Persona 4, are about to experience sudden growth spurts.
info.description:
As I've browsed the net there seems to be a lack of growth/expansion material for the Persona series and even with 4's popularity there is still little if none (Major props to the WG interactive on here though).

I wish to remedy that and offer this interactive as a haven of sorts for all sorts of potential growth/expansion story material for Persona 4.

A few ground rules though,
-Mostly all of the girls, with a few exceptions, can be used in any type of story. On that note, Nanako can be used but her story will be a mandatory time-skip due to her in-game age.

-While there is an "18+" rating to keep with the "M" rating of the game there are still a few things prohibited. Language is allowed as are Sexual themes but actual Sex on the other hand is not, Vore is allowed but only if the subject isn't killed off in the process (more on this later), Nudity is also okay but please let's keep it at least somewhat tasteful, thanks. Also let's stay away from anything too strange (as in constant crapping, animal transformations, putrid farts, etc). Basically in short keep it to the original game's standards.

-Story additions must be at least a paragraph or two with a decent amount of detail and effort. Plot may not be as important as in the actual game (and Arena) but let's have at least something of a story.

-No "script" dialogue, goes back to the above rule. Remember this is a story not a script.

-No killing off the cast whatsoever, gets complicated with any possible vore but just use a bit of DEM in that case. Regardless no one dies alright.

-There is no limit to the growths the girls can experience so go crazy.

-The growths are obviously female-only though the guys can take part in the story but they must remain as they are.

-Please no OOC, as in one of them suddenly turns evil at the drop of a dime, that's what their Shadow forms are there for.

-Lastly I would like to thank everyone who at one point or another contributed to this story. Thank you with your help this has been by far my most successful interactive having passed the four hundred entry mark. A fantastic achievement, really!. So once again thank you all past and present.

Well that's about it, other then that the whole point of this is to have fun and with any luck come up with some great P4 stories.
